item.title: Building WebSocket APIs with AWS API Gateway and CDK
item.description: Introduction In the continuously evolving landscape of web applications, real-time communication has become the gold standard for creating engaging and interactive user experiences. Whether you’re building a chat application, a collaborative online game, or a live dashboard, WebSocket technology has emerged as the enchanting solution that makes real-time magic happen. And when it comes to unleashing the full potential of WebSockets in a serverless and scalable manner, Amazon Web Services (AWS) has a spell of its own — AWS API Gateway.
